channel.title: Misc on MSSH
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on MSSH

item.title: Recommended content
item.description: Math Discrete Differential Geometry by Keenan Crane 3Blue1Brown Timothy Gowers: Thought process of a great mathematician Weitz: German math videos (mostly from the C.S. perspective) by Prof. Dr. Edmund Weitz Introduction to graph theory by Richard J. Trudeau Algebra: Chappter 0 by Aluffi Computer Science Missing Semester: C.S. basics Programming in Scala by Odersky, Spoon and Venners Tools Intro to Latex by Dr. Trefor Bazett

item.title: Infos über mein Wintersemester 22/23 (German)
item.description: Ich höre gerade folgende Vorlesungen: Computer Science Intelligente Sehsysteme Math Einführung in die Grundlagen der Numerik Sonstiges Außerdem besuche ich Grundzüge der Analysis und Geometrie auf Mannigfaltigkeiten (allerdings ohne Tutorien / Abgaben / Klausur und nur so lange ich das zeitlich schaffe), tutoriere Grundlagen der Robotik und schreibe meine Bachelorarbeit.

item.title: My current tech stack
item.description: Only a list of software i’m using, not endorsements of the product/company/person. OS Windows 11 Tools Windows Terminal OneNote: for handwritten notes Xournal++: for handwritten notes One by wacom Obsidian: structured/rehearsal notes, Media db Chrono: documenting and analyzing my habits Whatsapp (Desktop version) Google Chrome Hugo: mssh.dev Github (Website + Desktop): Hosting mssh.dev, version-control Languages / Editors VS Code: Editor Texmaker: Editor (LaTeX) python(3.8): Language of choice for most projects javascript with p5.
